name: Aspirin
uses: Pain relief, fever reduction, anti-inflammatory, prevent heart attacks and strokes in at-risk patients
side_effects: Stomach upset, heartburn, nausea, bleeding risk, allergic reactions

name: Ibuprofen
uses: Pain relief, fever reduction, inflammation reduction for conditions like arthritis
side_effects: Stomach upset, dizziness, heartburn, nausea, increased bleeding risk, kidney problems

name: Acetaminophen
side_effects: Rare at normal doses, liver damage with overdose, allergic reactions

name: Metformin
uses: Treatment of type 2 diabetes, helps control blood sugar levels
side_effects: Nausea, diarrhea, stomach upset, lactic acidosis (rare but serious)

name: Lisinopril
uses: Treatment of high blood pressure (hypertension), heart failure, improve survival after heart attack
side_effects: Dizziness, cough, headache, fatigue, low blood pressure

name: Amoxicillin
uses: Antibiotic for bacterial infections including ear infections, pneumonia, bronchitis, urinary tract infections

name: Atorvastatin
uses: Lower cholesterol and reduce risk of heart disease and stroke
side_effects: Muscle pain, digestive problems, increased blood sugar, liver enzyme changes

name: Omeprazole
uses: Treat stomach acid-related conditions like GERD, ulcers, acid indigestion
side_effects: Headache, stomach pain, nausea, diarrhea, vitamin B12 deficiency with long-term use

name: Levothyroxine
side_effects: When dose is too high: rapid heartbeat, weight loss, tremors, anxiety, sleep problems

name: Amlodipine
uses: Treatment of high blood pressure and chest pain (angina)
side_effects: Swelling in ankles/feet, dizziness, flushing, headache, fatigue

name: Zantac
uses: Previously used for heartburn and stomach ulcers (ranitidine)
discontinuation_reason: Recalled in 2020 due to contamination with NDMA, a probable carcinogen

name: Vioxx
uses: Previously used for pain and inflammation (rofecoxib)
side_effects: Increased risk of heart attack and stroke, stomach upset
discontinuation_reason: Withdrawn in 2004 due to increased cardiovascular risks

name: Gabapentin
uses: Treat nerve pain, seizures, restless leg syndrome
side_effects: Dizziness, drowsiness, fatigue, coordination problems, weight gain

name: Prednisone
uses: Corticosteroid for inflammation, allergies, autoimmune conditions, asthma
side_effects: Weight gain, mood changes, increased appetite, high blood sugar, weakened immune system

name: Albuterol
uses: Bronchodilator for asthma and COPD, opens airways
